mapper.select: select a.product_no, a.name, a.price, a.stock, a.content, a.image_path, b.quantity from tbl_product a, tbl_cart b where a.product_no=b.product_no and b.user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete tbl_cart where product_no = (select product_no from tbl_product where name=#{name})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_cart where user_id=#{user_id} and product_no=#{product_no}
mapper.update: update tbl_cart set quantity=#{quantity} where product_no = (select product_no from tbl_product where name=#{name})
